name: Faded (ajjamgames)
description:
You are a orb of light trying to escape the shadows. Dodge the shadows and make your way to the green light.
You can only pass through obstacles( ones which bounces off when not dark) if you you are completely dark.The more bright you are more vision you get but 
you also get detected by shadows easily.Also  you cannot brighten when inside obstacle.

Controls:
Click to move
Scroll wheel up or down to brighten or darken

Made for SOSJam.
Name of song : Faded/Fade by Alan Walker

It has only one level as I didn't get time to finish other level because of a busy week.
I might add more levels in future (If I am not feeling lazy ).
I also wanted to add fade music but later found out it can only be used for YouTube.*sigh*

Credits:
Music:

"Relaxing (Theme of X The Dog)" (https://opengameart.org/content/relaxing-theme-of-x-the-dog)
by Spring (https://opengameart.org/users/spring)

"Underwater Theme" (https://opengameart.org/content/underwater-theme)
by Cleyton Kauffman ( https://soundcloud.com/cleytonkauffman)

Fonts:
Kenney Future
by KenneyNL (https://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts)

PS: The zip file also contain map.png which has layout of level if it is too difficult.
